mapper.update: UPDATE rfid_asset a INNER JOIN ( SELECT MIN(EQUIP_ID) EQUIP_ID, MIN(USE_SCOPE_CD) USE_SCOPE_CD, ASSET_NO FROM RFID_ZEUS GROUP BY ASSET_NO ) b ON a.ASSET_NO = b.ASSET_NO SET a.ZEUS_EQUIP_ID = b.EQUIP_ID , a.ZEUS_YN = 'Y' , a.APLCTN_RANGE_CD = (CASE WHEN b.USE_SCOPE_CD = '1' THEN '단독활용' WHEN b.USE_SCOPE_CD = '2' THEN '공동활용허용' WHEN b.USE_SCOPE_CD = '3' THEN '공동활용서비스' END)

UPDATE RFID_ASSET AST INNER JOIN RFID_USER USR ON AST.USER_NO = USER.USER_NO INNER JOIN RFID_DEPT DPT ON USR.DEPT_NO = DPT.DEPT_NO INNER JOIN RFID_DEPT DPT2 ON DPT.PARENT_DEPT_NO = DPT2.DEPT_NO SET AST.TOP_DEPT_NO = DPT2.DEPT_NO, AST.TOP_DEPT_NAME = DPT2.DEPT_NAME, AST.DEPT_NO = DPT.DEPT_NO, AST.DEPT_NAME = DPT.DEPT_NAME, AST.USER_NO = USR.USER_NO, AST.USER_NAME = USR.USER_NAME, AST.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = #{lastUpdtPnttm}, AST.LAST_UPDUSR_ID = 'BATCH'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rfid_doc ( RQSTNO, DOCSTATCD, DOCSTATNM, DOCDIVCD, REGTIME, MODTIME, UPDATEYN, PRGSNO ) SELECT #{rqstno}, #{docstatcd}, #{docstatnm} #{docdivcd}, #{regtime}, #{modtime}, 'N', #{prgsno} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM rfid_doc WHERE RQSTNO = #{rqstno} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.RQSTNO, A.AUC_USER_NO, A.AUC_USER_NAME, A.AUC_DEPT_NO, A.AUC_DEPT_NAME, D.DEPT_NO AUC_TOP_DEPT_NO, D.DEPT_NAME AUC_TOP_DEPT_NAME FROM RFID_APPR_USERCNG A INNER JOIN RFID_APPR_RQST B ON A.RQSTNO = B.RQSTNO LEFT OUTER JOIN RFID_DEPT C ON A.AUC_DEPT_NO = C.DEPT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN RFID_DEPT D ON C.PARENT_DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO WHERE A.RQSTNO = #{rqstno}
mapper.update: UPDATE rfid_asset SET TOP_DEPT_NO = #{topDeptNo}, TOP_DEPT_NAME = #{topDeptName}, DEPT_NO = #{deptNo}, DEPT_NAME = #{deptName}, USER_NO = #{userNo}, USER_NAME = #{userName}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = #{lastUpdtPnttm}, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = 'BATCH' WHERE ASSET_SEQ IN ( SELECT ASSET_SEQ FROM rfid_appr_asset WHERE RQSTNO = #{rqstno} )

UPDATE rfid_asset SET ASSET_STATUS_CD = '반출중', LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = #{lastUpdtPnttm}, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = 'BATCH' WHERE ASSET_SEQ IN ( SELECT ASSET_SEQ FROM rfid_appr_asset WHERE RQSTNO = #{rqstno} ) AND ASSET_STATUS_CD = '정상'

UPDATE rfid_asset SET ASSET_STATUS_CD = '정상', LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = #{lastUpdtPnttm}, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = 'BATCH' WHERE ASSET_SEQ IN ( SELECT A.ASSET_SEQ FROM rfid_appr_asset A INNER JOIN rfid_appr_io_in B ON A.RQSTNO = B.RQSTNO INNER JOIN rfid_appr_io_in_asset C ON B.IN_RQSTNO = C.IN_RQSTNO AND A.ASSET_SEQ = C.ASSET_SEQ WHERE A.RQSTNO = #{rqstno} ) AND ASSET_STATUS_CD = '반출중'

UPDATE rfid_asset SET ASSET_STATUS_CD = '불용', DISUSE_YN = 'Y', DISUSE_DT = #{disuseDt}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = #{lastUpdtPnttm}, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = 'BATCH' WHERE ASSET_SEQ IN ( SELECT ASSET_SEQ FROM rfid_appr_asset WHERE RQSTNO = #{rqstno} )

UPDATE rfid_asset SET ASSET_STATUS_CD = #{assetStatusCd}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = #{lastUpdtPnttm}, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = 'BATCH' WHERE ASSET_SEQ IN ( SELECT ASSET_SEQ FROM rfid_appr_asset WHERE RQSTNO = #{rqstno} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rfid_user ( USER_NO, USER_HIS_NO, EMP_NO, DEPT_NO, DEPT_NAME, DEPT_HIS_NO, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_STAT_CD, USER_STAT_NAME, USER_POS_DIV_CD, USER_POS_DIV_NAME, USER_TEL_NO, USER_TYPE, GRANT_NO, USE_YN, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, POS_NO, POS_NAME ) SELECT USER_NO, USER_HIS_NO, EMP_NO, DEPT_NO, DEPT_NAME, DEPT_HIS_NO, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_STAT_CD, USER_STAT_NAME, USER_POS_DIV_CD, USER_POS_DIV_NAME, USER_TEL_NO, USER_TYPE, GRANT_NO, USE_YN, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, POS_NO, POS_NAME FROM RFID_MIS_USER A WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RFID_USER WHERE USER_NO = A.USER_NO )

INSERT INTO RFID_DEPT ( DEPT_NO ,DEPT_NAME ,DEPT_LEVEL ,PARENT_DEPT_NO ,DEPT_HEAD_USER_NO ,SORT_NUM ,FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,FRST_REGISTER_ID ,LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) SELECT DEPT_NO ,DEPT_NAME ,DEPT_LEVEL ,PARENT_DEPT_NO ,DEPT_HEAD_USER_NO ,SORT_NUM ,FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,FRST_REGISTER_ID ,LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM RFID_MIS_DEPT A WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RFID_DEPT WHERE DEPT_NO = A.DEPT_NO )

INSERT INTO RFID_SL_COMPANY ( COMP_SEQ ,COMP_CD ,COMP_NAME ,COMP_LEVEL ,COMP_BIZ_NO ,COMP_OWNER_NAME ,COMP_BIZ_TYPE1 ,COMP_BIZ_TYPE2 ,COMP_ADDR ,COMP_TEL ,COMP_EMAIL ,REMARK ,PARENT_COMP_SEQ ,SORT_NUM ,USE_YN ,FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,FRST_REGISTER_ID ,LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) SELECT COMP_SEQ ,COMP_CD ,COMP_NAME ,COMP_LEVEL ,COMP_BIZ_NO ,COMP_OWNER_NAME ,COMP_BIZ_TYPE1 ,COMP_BIZ_TYPE2 ,COMP_ADDR ,COMP_TEL ,COMP_EMAIL ,REMARK ,PARENT_COMP_SEQ ,SORT_NUM ,USE_YN ,FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,FRST_REGISTER_ID ,LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM RFID_MIS_CUST A WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RFID_SL_COMPANY WHERE COMP_SEQ = A.COMP_SEQ )

INSERT INTO RFID_POSITION ( POS_NO ,POS_NAME ,POS_LEVEL ,PARENT_POS_NO ,SORT_NUM ,USE_YN ,FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,FRST_REGISTER_ID ,LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) SELECT POS_NO ,POS_NAME ,POS_LEVEL ,PARENT_POS_NO ,SORT_NUM ,USE_YN ,FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,FRST_REGISTER_ID ,LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM RFID_MIS_POSITION A WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RFID_POSITION WHERE POS_NO = A.POS_NO )

INSERT INTO RFID_CONTRACT ( PURNO ,PURNM ,PURCD ,PURDIVCD ,AGGRDIVCD ,USERHISNO ,NATNCD ,CONTRDT ,CONTRSTARTDT ,CONTRENDDT ,CUSTHISNO ,DELIVERYPLACE ,DELIVERYDT ,REGTIME ,REGUSER ,MODTIME ,MODUSER ,CONTRAMT ,CONTRNO ,CUSTDIVCD ,CUSTWOMAN ,CUSTDISPER ,SWYN ,CONTRDIV ,STATENM ) SELECT PURNO ,PURNM ,PURCD ,PURDIVCD ,AGGRDIVCD ,USERHISNO ,NATNCD ,CONTRDT ,CONTRSTARTDT ,CONTRENDDT ,CUSTHISNO ,DELIVERYPLACE ,DELIVERYDT ,REGTIME ,REGUSER ,MODTIME ,MODUSER ,CONTRAMT ,CONTRNO ,CUSTDIVCD ,CUSTWOMAN ,CUSTDISPER ,SWYN ,CONTRDIV ,STATENM FROM RFID_MIS_CONTR A WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RFID_CONTRACT WHERE PURNO = A.PURNO )

INSERT INTO RFID_CONTRACT_DTL ( PURNO ,RQSTNO ,PRODNO ,PRODNM ,QTY ,SPEC ,UNIT ,GUSUCOST ,SPLYUCOST ,PROPYN ,USERHISNO ,ACCNO ,FORECURRAMT ,CURRENCYAMT ,SOFTWAREYN ,NTISYN ,REMARK ,REGTIME ,REGUSER ,MODTIME ,MODUSER ,USEOFPURPOSE ) SELECT PURNO ,RQSTNO ,PRODNO ,PRODNM ,QTY ,SPEC ,UNIT ,GUSUCOST ,SPLYUCOST ,PROPYN ,USERHISNO ,ACCNO ,FORECURRAMT ,CURRENCYAMT ,SOFTWAREYN ,NTISYN ,REMARK ,REGTIME ,REGUSER ,MODTIME ,MODUSER ,USEOFPURPOSE FROM RFID_MIS_CONTRDTL A WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RFID_CONTRACT_DTL WHERE PURNO = A.PURNO AND RQSTNO = A.RQSTNO AND PRODNO = A.PRODNO )
mapper.update: UPDATE RFID_USER A INNER JOIN RFID_MIS_USER B ON A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO SET A.USER_HIS_NO = B.USER_HIS_NO, A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO, A.DEPT_NO = B.DEPT_NO, A.DEPT_NAME = B.DEPT_NAME, A.DEPT_HIS_NO = B.DEPT_HIS_NO, A.USER_NAME = B.USER_NAME, A.USER_EMAIL = B.USER_EMAIL, A.USER_STAT_CD = B.USER_STAT_CD, A.USER_STAT_NAME = B.USER_STAT_NAME, A.USER_POS_DIV_CD = B.USER_POS_DIV_CD, A.USER_POS_DIV_NAME = B.USER_POS_DIV_NAME, A.USER_TEL_NO = B.USER_TEL_NO, A.USER_TYPE = B.USER_TYPE, A.GRANT_NO = CASE WHEN A.GRANT_NO = 'MGR' THEN 'MGR' WHEN A.GRANT_NO = 'ET1' THEN 'ET1' ELSE B.GRANT_NO END, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = B.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID = B.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.POS_NO = B.POS_NO, A.POS_NAME = B.POS_NAME

UPDATE RFID_DEPT A INNER JOIN RFID_MIS_DEPT B ON A.DEPT_NO = B.DEPT_NO SET A.DEPT_NAME = B.DEPT_NAME ,A.DEPT_LEVEL = B.DEPT_LEVEL ,A.PARENT_DEPT_NO = B.PARENT_DEPT_NO ,A.DEPT_HEAD_USER_NO = B.DEPT_HEAD_USER_NO ,A.SORT_NUM = B.SORT_NUM ,A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = B.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID = B.LAST_UPDUSR_ID

UPDATE RFID_SL_COMPANY A INNER JOIN RFID_MIS_CUST B ON A.COMP_SEQ = B.COMP_SEQ SET A.COMP_CD = B.COMP_CD ,A.COMP_NAME = B.COMP_NAME ,A.COMP_LEVEL = B.COMP_LEVEL ,A.COMP_BIZ_NO = B.COMP_BIZ_NO ,A.COMP_OWNER_NAME = B.COMP_OWNER_NAME ,A.COMP_BIZ_TYPE1 = B.COMP_BIZ_TYPE1 ,A.COMP_BIZ_TYPE2 = B.COMP_BIZ_TYPE2 ,A.COMP_ADDR = B.COMP_ADDR ,A.COMP_TEL = B.COMP_TEL ,A.COMP_EMAIL = B.COMP_EMAIL ,A.REMARK = B.REMARK ,A.PARENT_COMP_SEQ = B.PARENT_COMP_SEQ ,A.SORT_NUM = B.SORT_NUM ,A.USE_YN = B.USE_YN ,A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = B.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID = B.LAST_UPDUSR_ID

UPDATE RFID_POSITION A INNER JOIN RFID_MIS_POSITION B ON A.POS_NO = B.POS_NO SET A.POS_NAME = B.POS_NAME ,A.POS_LEVEL = B.POS_LEVEL ,A.PARENT_POS_NO = B.PARENT_POS_NO ,A.SORT_NUM = B.SORT_NUM ,A.USE_YN = B.USE_YN ,A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = B.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID = B.LAST_UPDUSR_ID

UPDATE RFID_CONTRACT A INNER JOIN RFID_MIS_CONTR B ON A.PURNO = B.PURNO SET A.PURNM = B.PURNM ,A.PURCD = B.PURCD ,A.PURDIVCD = B.PURDIVCD ,A.AGGRDIVCD = B.AGGRDIVCD ,A.USERHISNO = B.USERHISNO ,A.NATNCD = B.NATNCD ,A.CONTRDT = B.CONTRDT ,A.CONTRSTARTDT = B.CONTRSTARTDT ,A.CONTRENDDT = B.CONTRENDDT ,A.CUSTHISNO = B.CUSTHISNO ,A.DELIVERYPLACE = B.DELIVERYPLACE ,A.DELIVERYDT = B.DELIVERYDT ,A.MODTIME = B.MODTIME ,A.MODUSER = B.MODUSER ,A.CONTRAMT = B.CONTRAMT ,A.CONTRNO = B.CONTRNO ,A.CUSTDIVCD = B.CUSTDIVCD ,A.CUSTWOMAN = B.CUSTWOMAN ,A.CUSTDISPER = B.CUSTDISPER ,A.SWYN = B.SWYN ,A.CONTRDIV = B.CONTRDIV ,A.STATENM = B.STATENM

UPDATE RFID_CONTRACT_DTL A INNER JOIN RFID_MIS_CONTRDTL B ON A.PURNO = B.PURNO AND A.RQSTNO = B.RQSTNO AND A.PRODNO = B.PRODNO SET A.PRODNM = B.PRODNM ,A.QTY = B.QTY ,A.SPEC = B.SPEC ,A.UNIT = B.UNIT ,A.GUSUCOST = B.GUSUCOST ,A.SPLYUCOST = B.SPLYUCOST ,A.PROPYN = B.PROPYN ,A.USERHISNO = B.USERHISNO ,A.ACCNO = B.ACCNO ,A.FORECURRAMT = B.FORECURRAMT ,A.CURRENCYAMT = B.CURRENCYAMT ,A.SOFTWAREYN = B.SOFTWAREYN ,A.NTISYN = B.NTISYN ,A.REMARK = B.REMARK ,A.MODTIME = B.MODTIME ,A.MODUSER = B.MODUSER ,A.USEOFPURPOSE = B.USEOFPURPOSE
mapper.delete: DELETE A FROM RFID_USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN RFID_MIS_USER B ON A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO AND A.USER_HIS_NO = B.USER_HIS_NO WHERE B.USER_NO IS NULL
DELETE A FROM RFID_DEPT A LEFT OUTER JOIN RFID_MIS_DEPT B ON A.DEPT_NO = B.DEPT_NO WHERE B.DEPT_NO IS NULL
DELETE A FROM RFID_SL_COMPANY A LEFT OUTER JOIN RFID_MIS_CUST B ON A.COMP_SEQ = B.COMP_SEQ WHERE B.COMP_SEQ IS NULL
DELETE A FROM RFID_POSITION A LEFT OUTER JOIN RFID_MIS_POSITION B ON A.POS_NO = B.POS_NO WHERE B.POS_NO IS NULL
DELETE A FROM RFID_CONTRACT A LEFT OUTER JOIN RFID_MIS_CONTR B ON A.PURNO = B.PURNO WHERE B.PURNO IS NULL
DELETE A FROM RFID_CONTRACT_DTL A LEFT OUTER JOIN RFID_MIS_CONTRDTL B ON A.PURNO = B.PURNO AND A.RQSTNO = B.RQSTNO AND A.PRODNO = B.PRODNO WHERE B.PURNO IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE RFID_ASSET A INNER JOIN RFID_USER B ON A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO INNER JOIN RFID_DEPT C ON B.DEPT_NO = C.DEPT_NO INNER JOIN RFID_DEPT D ON C.PARENT_DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO SET A.USER_NAME = B.USER_NAME , A.DEPT_NO = C.DEPT_NO , A.DEPT_NAME = C.DEPT_NAME , A.TOP_DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO , A.TOP_DEPT_NAME = D.DEPT_NAME WHERE A.DEPT_NAME <> C.DEPT_NAME
